title: elpa fails to build on macOS with clang and gfortran
body:
looking at the log, i have no idea what is going on here:
```
==> 'make'
fdep/fortran_dependencies.mk:76: warning: overriding commands for target `test/Fortran/elpa2_test_complex_api-test_complex2_api.use_mods_elpa2_test_complex_api.o'
fdep/fortran_dependencies.mk:76: warning: ignoring old commands for target `test/Fortran/elpa2_test_complex_api-test_complex2_api.use_mods_elpa2_test_complex_api.o'
fdep/fortran_dependencies.mk:76: warning: overriding commands for target `test/Fortran/elpa2_test_complex_api-test_complex2_api.def_mods_elpa2_test_complex_api.o'
fdep/fortran_dependencies.mk:76: warning: ignoring old commands for target `test/Fortran/elpa2_test_complex_api-test_complex2_api.def_mods_elpa2_test_complex_api.o'
fdep/fortran_dependencies.mk:117: target `/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/elpa-2016.05.004-k34djzvl2eyhob2wni3dcw6qict3xncf/elpa-2016.05.004/.fortran_dependencies/elpa2_test_complex_api' given more than once in the same rule.
/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/usr/bin/make  all-am
fdep/fortran_dependencies.mk:76: warning: overriding commands for target `test/Fortran/elpa2_test_complex_api-test_complex2_api.use_mods_elpa2_test_complex_api.o'
fdep/fortran_dependencies.mk:76: warning: ignoring old commands for target `test/Fortran/elpa2_test_complex_api-test_complex2_api.use_mods_elpa2_test_complex_api.o'
fdep/fortran_dependencies.mk:76: warning: overriding commands for target `test/Fortran/elpa2_test_complex_api-test_complex2_api.def_mods_elpa2_test_complex_api.o'
fdep/fortran_dependencies.mk:76: warning: ignoring old commands for target `test/Fortran/elpa2_test_complex_api-test_complex2_api.def_mods_elpa2_test_complex_api.o'
fdep/fortran_dependencies.mk:91: /Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/elpa-2016.05.004-k34djzvl2eyhob2wni3dcw6qict3xncf/elpa-2016.05.004/.fortran_dependencies/dependencies.mk: No such file or directory
fdep/fortran_dependencies.mk:117: target `/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/elpa-2016.05.004-k34djzvl2eyhob2wni3dcw6qict3xncf/elpa-2016.05.004/.fortran_dependencies/elpa2_test_complex_api' given more than once in the same rule.
  F90 DEPS /Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/elpa-2016.05.004-k34djzvl2eyhob2wni3dcw6qict3xncf/elpa-2016.05.004/.fortran_dependencies/dependencies.mk
fdep/fortran_dependencies.mk:76: warning: overriding commands for target `test/Fortran/elpa2_test_complex_api-test_complex2_api.use_mods_elpa2_test_complex_api.o'
fdep/fortran_dependencies.mk:76: warning: ignoring old commands for target `test/Fortran/elpa2_test_complex_api-test_complex2_api.use_mods_elpa2_test_complex_api.o'
fdep/fortran_dependencies.mk:76: warning: overriding commands for target `test/Fortran/elpa2_test_complex_api-test_complex2_api.def_mods_elpa2_test_complex_api.o'
fdep/fortran_dependencies.mk:76: warning: ignoring old commands for target `test/Fortran/elpa2_test_complex_api-test_complex2_api.def_mods_elpa2_test_complex_api.o'
fdep/fortran_dependencies.mk:117: target `/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/elpa-2016.05.004-k34djzvl2eyhob2wni3dcw6qict3xncf/elpa-2016.05.004/.fortran_dependencies/elpa2_test_complex_api' given more than once in the same rule.
  PPFC     src/libelpa_public_la-elpa.lo
src/elpa.F90:58:6:

   use elpa1
      1
Fatal Error: Can't open module file ‘elpa1.mod’ for reading at (1): No such file or directory
compilation terminated.
make[1]: *** [src/libelpa_public_la-elpa.lo] Error 1
make: *** [all] Error 2
```
the closest issue i found online is https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=816086
